title: Using Uber Technologies’ (NYSE: UBER) Q1–Q4 2024 earnings releases, determine whether Uber’s 2024 quarterly Adjusted EBITDA results beat or missed management’s midpoint guidance. Express each quarter as “Q[X] 2024: BEAT (X.X%)” or “MISS (X.X%).” Use guidance provided in each prior quarter’s release. Round to 2 decimals.
description:
1. Find the midpoint EBITDA guidance in each quarter in 2024 by looking at the earnings press release from the prior quarter, then compare to the actual adjusted EBITDA in the earnings release in the desired quarter.
 
 1. Q1 2024: Use Q4 2023 guidance range $1.26B–$1.34B = midpoint $1.30B; compare to Q1 actual Adjusted EBITDA $1,382M; Beat% = (1,382−1,300)/1,300 = 6.31%: Q1 2024: BEAT (6.31%).
 
 2. Q2 2024: Use Q1 2024 guidance range $1.45B–$1.53B = midpoint $1.49B; compare to Q2 actual Adjusted EBITDA $1,570M; Beat% = (1,570−1,490)/1,490 = 5.37%: Q2 2024: BEAT (5.37%).
 
 3. Q3 2024: Use Q2 2024 guidance range $1.58B–$1.68B = midpoint $1.63B; compare to Q3 actual Adjusted EBITDA $1,690M; Beat% = (1,690−1,630)/1,630 = 3.68%: Q3 2024: BEAT (3.68%).
 
 4. Q4 2024: Use Q3 2024 guidance range $1.78B–$1.88B = midpoint $1.83B; compare to Q4 actual Adjusted EBITDA $1,842M; Beat% = (1,842−1,830)/1,830 = 0.66%: Q4 2024: BEAT (0.66%).

rubric.criteria: Use Q4 2023 earnings press release to find Q1 2024 EBITDA guidance range to be 1.26-1.34B.
Identify Q1 2024 midpoint EBITDA guidance to be (1.26 + 1.34) / 2 = $1.30B
Look in Q1 2024 Earnings report and find that Q1 2024 actual adjusted EBITDA is $1382M
Compare Q1 2024 midpoint EBITDA guidance to the actual adjusted EBITDA and conclude that Uber BEAT guidance by 1,382−1,300)/1,300 = 6.31%: Q1 2024: BEAT (6.31%)
Use Q1 2024 earnings press release to find Q2 2024 EBITDA guidance range to be 1.45-1.53B.
Identify Q2 2024 midpoint EBITDA guidance to be (1.45 + 1.53) / 2 = $1.49B
Look in Q2 2024 Earnings report and find that Q2 2024 actual adjusted EBITDA is $1570M
Compare Q2 2024 midpoint EBITDA guidance to the actual adjusted EBITDA and conclude that Uber BEAT guidance by (1,570−1,490)/1,490 = 5.37%: Q2 2024: BEAT (5.37%).
Use Q2 2024 earnings press release to find Q3 2024 EBITDA guidance range to be 1.58-1.68B.
Identify Q3 2024 midpoint EBITDA guidance to be (1.58 + 1.68) / 2 = $1.63B
Look in Q3 2024 Earnings report and find that Q3 2024 actual adjusted EBITDA is $1690M
Compare Q3 2024 midpoint EBITDA guidance to the actual adjusted EBITDA and conclude that Uber BEAT guidance by (1,690−1,630)/1,630 = 3.68%: Q3 2024: BEAT (3.68%).
Use Q3 2024 earnings press release to find Q4 2024 EBITDA guidance range to be 1.78-1.88B.
Identify Q4 2024 midpoint EBITDA guidance to be (1.78 + 1.88) / 2 = $1.83B
Look in Q4 2024 Earnings report and find that Q4 2024 actual adjusted EBITDA is $1,842M
Compare Q4 2024 midpoint EBITDA guidance to the actual adjusted EBITDA and conclude that Uber BEAT guidance by (1,842−1,830)/1,830 = 0.66%: Q4 2024: BEAT (0.66%).
